; docformat = 'rst' ;+ ; NAME: string1i ; ; PURPOSE: Simple int to string routine ;- function string1i,f,format=format,round=round,fix=fix if n_elements(fix) ne 1 then fix=0 ; round is the default if n_elements(round) ne 1 then round=1 if not keyword_set(format) then format='(I)' fout=f if round then fout=round(double(f)) if fix then fout=fix(double(f)) return,strtrim(string(round(fout,/L64),format=format),2) end
